mapper.select: select subject, startdate, enddate, event_img from event where enabled = 1

select group_no, group_name, group_img, catename, area_name, content from group_info left join area a on group_info.area_code = a.area_code left join interest_category ic on group_info.catecode = ic.catecode where enabled = 1 order by opendate desc limit 8

select gi.group_no, group_name, group_img, catename, area_name, gi.content, count(post_group.group_no) as posts from post_group left join post_category pc on post_group.post_catecode = pc.post_catecode left join group_info gi on post_group.group_no = gi.group_no left join area a on gi.area_code = a.area_code left join interest_category ic on gi.catecode = ic.catecode group by gi.group_no order by posts DESC limit 8
